item.title: [317] Adding shops help
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

Have you tried talking to the NPC instead of trading it?
Some NPC’s don’t open shops if you Trade it, only if you talk to it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding shops help
item.dc:creator: @killercam killercam
item.description:
@killercam wrote:

I guess I might be retarded, :o but i can’t figure out how to add a shop. I got the autospawn.cfg and the shops.cfg part down, but when I add it to client.java and compile and log in, the shop wont open. Im almost positive im doing something wrong in the client.java with the wanneshops part.
Here is the wanneshop part in the client.java if that helps. Mine is the bottom one.

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { // Pure shop 2 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 69; // Pure Shop } else if (NPCID == 552) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 76; // food guy

Thanks,
Gpot.

Read full topic
